sessions.title: Amazon EKS: Production-Grade Kubernetes
sessions.description: Deploy and manage production Kubernetes workloads on Amazon EKS. Explore cluster autoscaling, security best practices, observability, and cost optimization techniques.

sessions.title: Amazon ECS and AWS Fargate: Serverless Containers
sessions.description: Run containerized applications without managing servers using Amazon ECS and AWS Fargate. Learn task definitions, service discovery, load balancing, and auto-scaling patterns.

sessions.title: Building Event-Driven Architectures with AWS Lambda
sessions.description: Design scalable event-driven systems using AWS Lambda. Explore event sources, asynchronous patterns, error handling, and integration with EventBridge and SQS.
speakers: Rachel Kim, Serverless Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS CodePipeline: CI/CD at Scale
sessions.description: Build automated deployment pipelines with AWS CodePipeline. Learn multi-stage workflows, approval gates, cross-region deployments, and integration with third-party tools.

sessions.title: Infrastructure as Code with AWS CDK
sessions.description: Define cloud infrastructure using familiar programming languages with AWS Cloud Development Kit. Explore constructs, stacks, cross-stack references, and testing strategies.

sessions.title: Container Security Best Practices on AWS
sessions.description: Secure containerized workloads on EKS and ECS. Learn image scanning, runtime security, network policies, secrets management, and compliance monitoring.
speakers: David Park, Container Security Lead, AWS

sessions.title: Observability with Amazon CloudWatch and X-Ray
sessions.description: Gain deep insights into application performance using CloudWatch and X-Ray. Explore metrics, logs, traces, dashboards, and automated remediation with CloudWatch Alarms.

sessions.title: AWS Lambda: Performance Optimization Techniques
sessions.description: Maximize Lambda function performance and minimize costs. Explore cold start reduction, memory optimization, concurrency management, and execution environment best practices.

sessions.title: GitOps and Continuous Deployment with AWS
sessions.description: Implement GitOps workflows for declarative infrastructure and application deployment. Learn Flux, ArgoCD integration with EKS, and automated drift detection.

sessions.title: Microservices on EKS: Design Patterns
sessions.description: Build resilient microservices architectures on Amazon EKS. Explore service mesh patterns, inter-service communication, distributed tracing, and failure isolation.
speakers: Elena Volkov, Principal Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Blue/Green and Canary Deployments on AWS
sessions.description: Implement zero-downtime deployment strategies using blue/green and canary patterns. Learn traffic shifting, automated rollbacks, and feature flag integration.

sessions.title: Auto Scaling for Modern Applications
sessions.description: Design intelligent auto-scaling strategies for containers and serverless workloads. Explore target tracking, step scaling, scheduled scaling, and predictive scaling with ML.
speakers: Patricia Lee, Compute Optimization Lead, AWS

sessions.title: AWS CEO Keynote: The Future of Cloud Computing
sessions.description: Join AWS CEO for the flagship keynote unveiling the latest innovations in cloud computing, AI/ML, and infrastructure. Discover new services, customer success stories, and the future roadmap.
speakers: Adam Selipsky, CEO, Amazon Web Services
